title: Neural Hive is Recruiting!!!!
content:
https://preview.redd.it/47c56rspogke1.jpg?width=1080&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=78eb7d1149827425ba7f0e49f13447333ef3279c

🚀 Neural Hive is Recruiting! 🔥

Want to be part of the AI revolution at PES Ecity? This is your chance to work on cutting-edge projects, plan epic events, and unleash your creativity with PES’s leading AI/ML club.

We’re looking for passionate people to join these domains:

👨‍💻 Tech

🎨 Design

📱 Social Media & Marketing

📋 Operations

🎉 Events

✨ Last date to fill the form: 22st Feb  ( **Both EC and RR students can apply** )

📌 Don’t miss out on this exciting opportunity to create, innovate, and grow!

👉 Apply now :  [https://forms.gle/crwX31hr77HMXA6E8](https://forms.gle/crwX31hr77HMXA6E8)

💡 Be part of something big. Join the revolution with Neural Hive! ( [https://linktr.ee/neuralhive](https://linktr.ee/neuralhive) )

comments.body: Ahh times up, can't do anything.
mans posted this a DAY before the deadline
I was supposed to post this earlier but was lazy af and kinda forgot.
